# Type Alias: DeepValue\<TValue, TAccessor\>

```ts
type DeepValue<TValue, TAccessor> = DeepRecord<TValue> extends infer TDeepRecord ? TAccessor extends keyof TDeepRecord ? TDeepRecord[TAccessor] : never : never;
```
